title: Does modern lifestyle cause pollution? - Quora

response.answer_text: The unprecedented increase of vehicles and uncontrolled waste generation are primary cause of pollution.Wastage of food,other consumer items are on the rise.Over consumption is the style of the day.Modern devices add to wastage and pollution.Resource depletion is another challenge.Figures of unnecessary wastage is of himalayan nature. Gandhiji has said “Nature provides everything for needs of man,but not for his greeds.”

All organisms “pollute,” including humans. But it is a natural process. Some simply call it recycling, turning one thing into another in an symbiotic chain of life. Of course there is always the government that wants to tax or otherwise make a buck off nature, whether it is global warming or the availability of water.
